entry.title: Start my journey of building Evolutionary Development Process

link.title: Start my journey of building Evolutionary Development Process

entry.content:
Finally started my journey of building Evolutionary Development Process. Set up the GitHub Pages-ready structure and drafted initial chapters and blog scaffolding.

flowchart TD A[Start]
